PHRASE.LANG: Make sure they have something to hang on their wall this year. [#Legal]
Assurez-vous qu'ils aient quelque chose à accrocher à leur cheminée cette année. [#Legal]
Damit sie dieses Jahr etwas zum Aufhängen haben. [#Legal]
Fai in modo che abbiano qualcosa da appendere alla parete quest'anno. [#Legal]
Asegúrate de que tengan algo para colgar en las paredes este año. [#Legal]
올해는 벽에 걸 무언가를 그들에게 만들어 주도록 해요. [#Legal]
Make sure they have something to hang on their wall this year. [#Legal]
讓朋友今年在牆上有東西可掛。 [#Legal]
讓朋友今年在牆上有東西可掛。 [#Legal]
Make sure they have something to hang on their wall this year. [#Legal]
